body_html: @yaroslavvb This is a bit hard for us to repro. A smaller repro will definitely help. but if it's not possible, next time it happens to you, could you get a full gdb bt trace of all process & threads? For each process, thread apply all bt should do the work.
body_text: @yaroslavvb This is a bit hard for us to repro. A smaller repro will definitely help. but if it's not possible, next time it happens to you, could you get a full gdb bt trace of all process & threads? For each process, thread apply all bt should do the work.
body: @yaroslavvb This is a bit hard for us to repro. A smaller repro will definitely help. but if it's not possible, next time it happens to you, could you get a full gdb bt trace of all process & threads? For each process, `thread apply all bt` should do the work.
